contentrichtext.text: {{archive}} '''This page is an archive of the discussion surrounding the proposed deletion of the page entitled [[Xi'an Jiaotong University]].''' '''This page is kept as an historic record.''' '''The result of the debate was to delete the article.''' ---- Apparently a letter from the University's president addressing some more immediate issues. Neither an article nor a start on one. [[User:UninvitedCompany|UninvitedCompany]] 16:22, 18 May 2004 (UTC) *Ri-i-i-i-ght. Delete. May not be patent nonsense, but it's a start. - [[User:Lucky 6.9|Lucky 6.9]] 21:55, 18 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete. It ''is'' patent nonsense. Content is irrelevant, immaterial, and not germane to the title of the article. [[User:Dpbsmith|Dpbsmith]] 22:33, 18 May 2004 (UTC) *Keep. There is some information there and I cleaned it up. [[User:Andris|Andris]] 01:59, May 19, 2004 (UTC) **Ooh, nice job. Another new stub is born! Keep present revision. - [[User:Lucky 6.9|Lucky 6.9]] 16:33, 19 May 2004 (UTC) ***Keep! It's an article ''now.'' -- [[User:Cymydog Naakka|Cymydog Naakka]] 07:55, 22 May 2004 (UTC) ---- This page is now preserved as an archive of the debate and is no longer 'live'. Subsequent comments on the issue or the deletion should be placed on other relevant 'live' pages. '''Please do not edit this page.''' ----
